description.lang: Simon iO Dimmer is integrated by Electronic Dimmer and a Rocker,that provides Z-Wave communication attributes. The touch surface offers an slider area in order to adjust the light level showing the dimming intensit y with 7 LEDs . Simon iO Dimmer is ready to operate with Z-Wave controllers and configured to be managed by Simon100 IO APP using the HUB plug IO for getting a better user experience.

Z-Wave Plus Lifeline- On -> CC Basic, Basic Report, Value 0x01 - 0x63 Report the dimming level- Off -> CC Basic, Basic Report, Value 0x00Instant Power Consumption vary over 10% and is stable almost 2sec- CC Meter, Meter Report, Electric meter, Consumed, Watts, Size 4, Precision 1, Value (W)Calibration requirement change. (If device needs to be calibrated and is Added into a Z-Wave network, it will report after receive an Association Set of life line).- Calibration required -> CC Configuration, Configuration Report, Param 23, Value 0xFF- Calibration not required -> CC Configuration, Configuration Report, Param 23, Value 0x00After reset the Z-Wave module, a DEVICE-RESET-LOCALLY-NOTIFICATION is sent.
CtrlOn/Off Report when load state is changed:- On -> CC Basic, Basic Report, Value 0x01 - 0x63 Report the dimming level- Off -> CC Basic, Basic Report, Value 0x00
Allows to turn ON or OFF the central LED
Turns the LED OFF
Turns the central LED ON
Sets the delay time to turn on the light
Instantly. Disable timming
1 second (0x01) to 127 seconds (0x7F) in 1 second resolution
1 second (0x80) to 127 minutes (0xFE) in 1 minute resolution
Sets the time the light stays on.
Instantly. Disable timming
1 second (0x01) to 127 seconds (0x7F) in 1 second resolution
1 second (0x80) to 127 minutes (0xFE) in 1 minute resolution
Sets the central led ilumination when the key is in repose state
LED OFF
Central LED on at 20% of maximum level
Lock or Unlock the direct control of the load
Unlock the direct control of load
Lock the direct control of load
Resets groups, Z-Wave status, and some or all configurations depending on the configuration value (write only)
Parameters, Groups, and Z-Wave status are restored to default.
Parameters, Groups, and Z-Wave status are restored to default.
Sets the delay time to turn off the light
Instantly. Disable timming
1 second (0x01) to 127 seconds (0x7F) in 1 second resolution
1 second (0x80) to 127 minutes (0xFE) in 1 minute resolution
Controls the behavior of the product when the key is pressed
When short press, the device toggles the load. The Slider does not work.
When short press, the device turns ON the load. The Slider does not work
When short press, the device turns OFF the load. The Slider does not works

When short press, the device turns ON the load. When hold press from 2seconds to 10seconds device turns OFF the load. The Slider does not works with this configuration, the device will not send the Node Info neither Show the LEDs feedback with this press action. The Slider does not work
When short press, the device toggles the load. The Slider dims the load when it is ON
Allows to identify a product using its central LED (write only)
the central LED blinks for 5 seconds in order to identify the device
Reports the state of the charge (read only)
Load is OFF
Load is ON
Last active dimming value
Reports if calibration is required or not (read only)
Calibration is not required
It is necessary to calibrate the dimmer to work properly
Locks or unlocks the long press on the key
Long press works as described previously

Long press of from 2 seconds to 10 seconds does not send a the Node Info. Long press of t&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;30s Parameters, except Lock long press are restored to default and device send a Node Info.
Sets the time it takes to turn on the light (ramp time)
Instantly. Disable timming
1 second (0x01) to 127 seconds (0x7F) in 1 second resolution
1 second (0x80) to 127 minutes (0xFE) in 1 minute resolution
Sets the time it takes to turn off the light (ramp time)
Instantly. Disable timming
1 second (0x01) to 127 seconds (0x7F) in 1 second resolution
1 second (0x80) to 127 minutes (0xFE) in 1 minute resolution
Sets the minimun dimming value
Once the devices gets a value through Z-Wave it Scales the value read according this minimum margin
Sets the maximum dimming value
Once the devices gets a value through Z-Wave it Scales the value read according this maximum margin
Returns or sets the last non zero dimming value. In case of Set the device turns ON the load.
returns or sets the last non zero dimming value. In case of Set the device turns ON the load
Performs a device calibration
Device performs calibration using Trailing and leading Edge and decides which one is better
Device performs calibration using Trailing and leading Edge and decides which one is better
Device is calibrated using Leading Edge
